Flub.Name: Duration
Flub.Description: The number of erosion cycles to simulate. Usually 200 is sufficient.

Flub.Name: Granularity
Flub.Description: Whether debris should be fine like dust, or coarse like rocks and even boulders.

Flub.Name: BasLen
Flub.Description: The sub-simulation length of each particle.

Flub.Name: Radius
Flub.Description: The area affected by each particle.

Flub.Name: Random
Flub.Description: The randomness of each particle's motion.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
